head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HEMINWAY, VIRGINIA CARBERY BOYD SEMENENKO

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HEMINWAY, VIRGINIA CARBERY BOYD SEMENENKO

block.p: HEMINWAY - Virginia Carbery Boyd Semenenko. On September 21, 2000. Loving wife of the late John Hylan Heminway and the late Serge Semenenko. Cherished mother of Christine Semenenko. Adored grandmother of Dylan Semenenko Clark and adored mother-in-law of Anthony Eastburn Clark. Beloved sister of Bey Hartford, Kathleen Poole and Honor Smith. Friend of devoted caregivers. Contributions in her memory may be made to a charity of your choice.

Adored grandmother of Dylan Semenenko Clark and adored mother-in-law of Anthony Eastburn Clark. Beloved sister of Bey Hartford, Kathleen Poole and Honor Smith. Friend of devoted caregivers. Contributions in her memory may be made to a charity of your choice.
